metadata.title: CVE-2022-31629 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In PHP versions before 7.4.31, 8.0.24 and 8.1.11, the vulnerability enablesnetwork and same-site attackers to set a standard insecure cookie in thevictim's browser which is treated as a `__Host-` or `__Secure-` cookie byPHP applications.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31629` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.4 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.8
